hero.subtitle: Your Smart AI Assistant for Seva Kendra Services
hero.description: Citizens often need to fill in multiple government service forms at Seva Kendras (e.g., for certificates, licenses, and welfare schemes). This AI tool auto-fills these forms based on uploaded documents (Aadhaar, PAN, voter ID, etc.), reducing manual effort and errors.

hero.upload_desc: Support for Aadhaar, PAN, Voter ID, and more
hero.autofill_desc: Smart extraction engine to fill data automatically

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to help you with all your government service needs. Reach out to us anytime!

form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...
form.success_text: Thank you for reaching out to us. We will get back to you within 24 hours.

items.question: What documents do I need to bring?
items.answer: Required documents vary by service. Generally, you'll need identity proof (Aadhar/PAN), address proof, and service-specific documents. Check our services page for detailed requirements.

items.question: How long does processing take?
items.answer: Most services are processed within 1-3 working days. Urgent services can be expedited for an additional fee. You'll receive SMS/email updates on your application status.

items.question: Are your services government authorized?
items.answer: Yes, we are an authorized Digital Seva Kendra partner under the Digital India initiative. All our services comply with government regulations and security standards.

items.question: Can I track my application status?
items.answer: Absolutely! You'll receive a unique tracking ID after submission. Use this ID on our website or call our support team for real-time status updates.

emergency.title: Need Urgent Assistance?
emergency.text: For urgent matters or emergency support, contact us immediately

hero.title: About Digital Seva Kendra
hero.subtitle: Empowering citizens through digital transformation of government services

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: To bridge the gap between citizens and government services through innovative technology solutions. We are committed to making essential government services accessible, efficient, and hassle-free for every Indian citizen.
mission.text2: Our AI-powered platform eliminates the complexity of government paperwork, reduces processing time, and ensures accuracy in document submission and form filling.
mission.vision_text: Digital-first government services for all citizens
